
**************************************************************
*            Stride Performance Test Results                 *
**************************************************************

Testing on 10000 array elements each of size 4 bytes with stride 1.
Total array size is 40000 bytes.

Elements in the array are accessed with write/read pairs.
This is done first on element[0], then element [1] and so on.
The entire process is repeated 4 times.

No sum of array elements was maintained. All simulated cache 
traffic was from array accesses.

Total element accesses: 80000  (40000 read and 40000 write)
Total bytes accessed: 320000


==============================================================
          Aggregate Cache and Performance Statistics
==============================================================

Simulated Cache Characteristics:
--------------------------------

Lines=64  Associativity=1 (direct mapped)  Block_size=64
Total cache size is: 4096 bytes

The simulated cache is a "write-back" type: dirty blocks are not written
to memory until evicted, at which time a "write_for_eviction"
is recorded. When a line is written partially, then a
"read_for_write" accounts the need to read the line from
memory before updating it.

Performance Results:
--------------------

Accesses=80000  Hits=77500 (96.9%)
Read Misses=0 (0.0%) Write Misses=2500 (6.2%)  Evictions=2436
Reads=40000  Writes=40000  Reads_for_writes=2500  Writes_for_evictions=2436
Dirty blocks remaining=64

Time for hits=77.50us  Time for memory reads=250.00us
Time for memory writes (including flushing dirties)=325.00us
Estimated total memory access time:   With caching=652.50us   No caching=9.20ms
Speedup: 14.1x


==============================================================
          Contents of individual cache line controls
==============================================================

Tag has 52 bits

Line  Valid   Dirty Tag
    0   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
    1   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
    2   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
    3   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
    4   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
    5   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
    6   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
    7   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
    8   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
    9   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
   10   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
   11   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
   12   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
   13   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
   14   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
   15   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
   16   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
   17   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
   18   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
   19   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
   20   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
   21   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
   22   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
   23   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
   24   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
   25   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
   26   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
   27   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
   28   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
   29   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
   30   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
   31   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
   32   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
   33   VALID DIRTY 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001001
